document.full_text: cannes' 2011 slate seems designed to avoid the pitfalls of last year's competition, which failed to produce a single oscar winner, crossover commercial success or grand cinema scandal -- the three boxes any great film festival worthy of the name needs to tick.
document.title: cannes turns to big stars, edgy auteurs
lines_and_colors: cannes' 2011 slate seems designed to avoid the pitfalls of last year's competition, which failed to produce a single oscar winner, crossover commercial success or grand cinema scandal -- the three boxes any great film festival worthy of the name needs to tick.
